_header: Through a forest as I gan ride
_description: The maid and the magpie, a love adventure, a dialogue between a betrayed maiden and her lover — seventeen cross-rhymed quatrains

BodRawC813.First Lines:
Throughe a forest as I can rydeto take my sporte yn on
                    mornyng…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…I trust to recouer my harte agayneand crystes curse goo wythe
                    yow
